dct_title_s: World LNG map 2017 edition / designed, produced and distributed by Petroleum Economist in association with Tellurian ; designed by K. Fuller and P. Bush. (Title panel)
dct_description_sm: Heights and depths shown by shading. Shows gas fields, gas pipelines, liquefied natural gas import terminals, liquefied natural gas export plants, and offshore terminals. "Published March 2017." Accompanies: Petroleum Economist, v.84, no.4, May 2017. Includes legend and sources, text, statistical tables, graphs, 4 inset maps, and 4 ancillary maps. 4 Insets: LNG terminals & plants: East Mediterranean -- LNG terminals & plants: US East Coast -- LNG terminals & plants: US Gulf of Mexico -- LNG terminals: Qatar and United Arab Emirates. 4 Ancillary maps: LNG terminals: Southwest Europe -- LNG terminals: China -- LNG terminals: Japan -- World importers as at March 2017. Title panel and advertisement on verso.
